greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists p(1), p(2), ..., p(n), p(n-1), ..., p(1), where p(i) = i-th prime.
comment: Row n contains 2n-1 terms and each column lists the prime numbers A000040.
Triangle of primes mentioned in A061802.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Mar 09 2008
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 07 2008, Nov 15 2008
